channel.title: Favorite Classes in team fortress 2
channel.description:
i wanna know what classes you guys like mine are:
Sniper-Got the Grey matter achievement within the first 15 min. i ever played. love the sniper.
Spy: backstabbing and sapping are fun as hell
Scout: hard classes to excel in but easy if you just want to have fun
Demo-man: same idea as solider but you have to be more tactical with him
my least favorites are engineer(sentry's suck),heavy, and solider(everyone spams rockets and they don't like to work on teams)
so what are your guy's favorite/least favorite:freeman:

item.title: Favorite Classes in team fortress 2
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
I prefer soldier and sniper, but on public servers, Pyro and Demo seems to be the most effective.

/sad that TFC turned into a spamfast for TF2.

I love playing all the classes except medic. I only play medic when the team really needs it.

item.title: Favorite Classes in team fortress 2
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Scout because running around and capping the intel on average (ie. Deathmatch on CTF maps) severs is fun.
Heavy because shooting people is fun.
Sniper because sniping is fun.
Spy because stealth is fun.
Pyro because fire is fun.
ect. ect. for all classes.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Classes in team fortress 2
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Heavy, because a big ass machinegun!

Sniper because I usually aim well

Pyro because close quarters are awesome

Demoman because I like spam! Yam!

Scout because he’s the best one-on-one class.

Medic because of credit to team.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Classes in team fortress 2
item.dc:creator: Jingles
item.description:
On my Xbox: Engineer, Spy and Scout.
On my PC: Pyro and heavy
